result.msg: Must be used before SparkInterpreter (%spark) initialized

paragraphs.title: Create Temporary Tables for the Actress And Actor Reference Data

result.msg:
actressesDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [count: bigint, name: string, results: struct<people:array<struct<bio:struct<text:string>,hero:struct<alt:string,height:string,src:string,width:string>,index:bigint,name:struct<text:string>>>>]
actorsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [count: bigint, name: string, results: struct<people:array<struct<bio:struct<text:string>,hero:struct<alt:string,height:string,src:string,width:string>,index:bigint,name:struct<href:string,text:string>>>>]

paragraphs.title: Create a Unified DataFrame from the Temp Tables
paragraphs.text:
val actressesExplodedDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT (90000 + people.index) as id, people.name.text as name, people.bio.text as bio, people.hero.src as img FROM actresses_temp LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE (results.people) p AS people")

val actorsExplodedDF = sqlContext.sql("SELECT (10000 + people.index) as id, people.name.text as name, people.bio.text as bio, people.hero.src as img FROM actors_temp LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE (results.people) p AS people")

val actressesAndActorsDF = actressesExplodedDF.unionAll(actorsExplodedDF).cache()
actressesAndActorsDF.show()
